newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures slip on long-liquidation.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures slip on long-liquidation.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended lower across the board on Thursday, as long-liquidation in nearby months spilled over into other contracts, traders said.
Amid continued concerns over abundant near-term supplies, the market was mainly spurred by technical factors.
Prices ranged from 2.2 yen to 3.2 yen per kg lower. Benchmark February was 2.2 yen weaker at 141.9 yen.
The market opened weaker, as the yen's firmer tone against the dollar also undermined market sentiment, they said.
Price losses in distant months were limited, supported by some fresh buying by trade houses, they said.
